solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public int minSubArrayLen(int s, int[] a) {--newline--      if (a == null || a.length == 0)--newline--        return 0;--newline--      --newline--      int i = 0, j = 0, sum = 0, min = Integer.MAX_VALUE;--newline--      --newline--      while (j < a.length) {--newline--        sum += a[j++];--newline--        --newline--        while (sum >= s) {--newline--          min = Math.min(min, j - i);--newline--          sum -= a[i++];--newline--        }--newline--      }--newline--      --newline--      return min == Integer.MAX_VALUE ? 0 : min;--newline--    }--newline--}
